remarks: The opposite Yoneda embedding is a functor from ` oppCat `` C ` to the functor category ` C -> SetCat ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
oyoncl.o $e |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) $.
oyoncl.y $e |- Y = ( Yon ` O ) $.
oyoncl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
oyoncl.s $e |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) $.
oyoncl.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
oyoncl.h $e |- ( ph -> ran ( Homf ` C ) C_ U ) $.
oyoncl.q $e |- Q = ( C FuncCat S ) $.
oyoncl $p |- ( ph -> Y e. ( O Func Q ) ) $.
